column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We are sorry to see you had a disappointing experience with us
column2: Penelope. If you are open to it
column3: our management team would love the opportunity to speak with you about this. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column4: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
